DOC.detailed_description: This prospective observational follow-up study single center . Number patient : It estimate enroll 100 patient Taiwan . Population : Female patient pregnancy confirm , least 20 year age diagnose chronic hepatitis B . The patient able communicate well , provide informed consent willing participate entire study . Inclusion criterion : Patients must meet follow criterion 1 . Documented chronic hepatitis B define clinical history compatible chronic hepatitis B detectable serum HBsAg 2 . Female 20 year age confirm pregnancy 3 . Willing able comply requirement observational followup study 4 . Willing able provide write informed consent participate study Exclusion criterion : Patients exclude study follow reason : 1 . Concurrent infection hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) , hepatitis D virus ( HDV ) human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) 2 . One know primary secondary cause liver disease hepatitis B ( e.g. , alcoholism , non-alcoholic steatohepatitis , autoimmune hepatitis , malignancy hepatic involvement , hemochromatosis , alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency , Wilson 's disease , congenital metabolic condition affect liver , congestive heart failure severe cardiopulmonary disease ) . 3 . Any concurrent medical psychosocial condition likely preclude compliance schedule evaluation protocol likely confound efficacy safety observation study . 4 . Enrolled planning enroll another clinical trial investigational agent participate study . 5 . Patients antiviral therapy chronic hepatitis B
